items.name: Infitx
items.description: INFITX focuses on building and supporting equitable and inclusive financial services to help alleviate poverty and gender inequality.

items.name: LexTego
items.description: LexTego helps you to identify bad actors with a real-time transaction monitoring system, for fraud and anti-money laundering.

items.name: ThitsaWorks
items.description: ThitsaWorks drives financial equity and inclusion for the unbanked & underbanked in developing economies through its data-driven solutions.

items.name: PaySys Labs
items.description: Paysys Labs offers digital banking, CMS, financial, biometric, wealth, and merchant management system solutions.

items.name: Sybrin
items.description: Sybrin a global technology company providing payment & information processing solutions for clearing houses, commercial banks & corporates.

items.name: WiredIn
items.description: WiredIn is an information technology company that provides software development, web designing, and website development services.
